attributes.review: App is almost unusable. The content on the app is horrendous. The playback and response time of the app is so slow. I can not believe the App Store allowed this app.
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: This app literally HACKED MY INFO. NO ONE GET THIS APP❌❌❌ I literally got scammed 😭😭😭 Also after the number that verifies if it’s your phone number sent me trumps nudes like an hour after!!!! I’m scarred for life😪😪😪😪
attributes.title: THE WORST

attributes.review: After I put all my info in I got a message on top of a dark grey screen saying “ 如果您不向中國政府支付一千美元，則我們會在1小時內洩露您的社會保險號，並使用特朗普總統的信用卡購買物品，將其運送到您的家庭住址，然後使用中文VPN來讓我們這樣做 使其看起來好像是從您的設備購買的。 -剩餘時間：58:38 ---“ and in English it translates to “In 1 hour if you don't pay one thousand USD to the Chinese Government then we will leak your social security number and buy items using President Trump's credit card, ship it to your home address, and use a Chinese VPN letting us do this and make it seem like the purchase was from your device. ---TIME REMAINING: 58:38---“ I didn’t know what to do and it’s only a matter of time until I see a package I didn’t order at my front door. I heard my neighbors got the same message. I also heard one message saying this is for your country banning an app called “Tik Tac” or something like that. Please President Trump, please save us from this Chinese Hack!
attributes.title: THE CHINESE GOVERNMENT IS BAD!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking it would be such a great way for me to interact with Mr. Trump and his already strong and growing campaign. I was meet with a laggy loading screen and a plethora of Bernie 2020 ads. Actually, I take it back. Although the app itself sucked and was a horrible way for Trump to spread his platform and messages the Bernie 2020 ads were appealing and calmed the soul. So in conclusion, refuse to re-elect Trump in November and vote for Biden!!!!
attributes.title: so disappointed 😔

attributes.review: i tried to download it but my phone is allergic racism 🧚🏽‍♀️
attributes.title: Not it fam

attributes.review: If I could rate zero stars I would it took up a huge amount of space on my phone, took forever to download, and messed with all the settings in my phone. This is a disaster of an app and shouldn’t be used by anyone! 👎
attributes.title: Terrible App

attributes.review: I have already written a review about this disgusting application but it must be said again. Do not by any means support Donald J Trump by downloading this app because just as he did to me 😔 he could choke you and make you take a whiff of his fungus covered toes 🤢 This brings back horrible memories and I have nightmares about this every night 😭Kanye 2020
attributes.title: Flashbacks...PTSD

attributes.title: Adrian Velasquez

attributes.review: Hi so I just downloaded the app and immediately my phone shut down and couldn’t turn back on for hours. I had to throw it off a balcony just to reboot the system it was so annoying and then once I opened the app I kept seeing this orange throng popping up a lot and at first I thought it was a weird pixel or glitch but no it’s the entire app. I’m deleting it now because of how inefficient it is, so thank you for listening to my cautionary tale.
attributes.title: Don’t download this app🤮🤢
